mapper.select: SELECT ab.* FROM books ab LEFT JOIN book_family_users bm ON ab.id = bm.book_id AND bm.user_id = #{userId} AND bm.status = 0 WHERE (ab.user_id = #{userId} OR bm.id IS NOT NULL) AND ab.status = 0 ORDER BY ab.created_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM books WHERE id = #{bookId} AND status = 0

select books.id, books.name, books.type, books.cover_image, books.description, books.status, books.budget_amount, count(bills.id) as billCount, sum(IF(bills.type = 2, bills.amount, 0)) as total_income, sum(IF(bills.type = 1, bills.amount, 0)) as total_expense from books left join bills on bills.book_id = books.id where books.user_id = #{userId} or books.id = #{familyBookId} group by books.id
